title: No Smoking Indoors
description: No smoking inside the unit or out in the balcony. There will be a fine for this.

title: Respect the Neighbors
description: Please be respectful of the property and the neighbors at all times.

title: Parties
description: No parties or events. Registered guests only. No additional people will be permitted in the unit without prior notice.

title: Electricity
description: Electricity is very expensive in Costa Rica. Please help us conserve energy by keeping the house temperature at 28Â°C when you are not in the unit. If you plan on leaving the balcony doors open for more than 15 mins, please turn the AC off.

title: Maximum Occupancy
description: We only allow up to 4 guests and all guests must be registered at the gate. No pets allowed other than service dog.

title: Check-in and Check-out
description: Check-in anytime after 3 PM; Check-out no later than 11 AM. If you have a special request of either early check-in or late check-out, don't hesitate to ask, we will accommodate if we can!

title: Property Damage
description: Fees will apply if you severely damage the property.
